Title: Chasing the Bus
Plot: A bus carrying 23 passengers from Los Angeles to Las Vegas crashes less than 40 miles from its destination, killing nine people. The CSIs soon discover that a recent parolee was on the bus, but is now unaccounted for.
GuestStars: Denis Arndt, Joseph D. Reitman, Cara Buono, Scott Plank, Eddie Jemison, Kevin Will, Christopher Caso, Stephon Fuller, Monica Garcia, Stuart Gold, Jim Hanna, Jerry Hauck, Revital Krawetz, Eric Matheny, Lauren Hodge
